mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(o.order_qt * p.product_price * (1 - p.discount_rate)) AS totalSales FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, AVG(o.order_qt * p.product_price * (1 - p.discount_rate)) AS averageSales FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC
